config_description: Enables creation of transiently replicated keyspaces on this node. Transient replication is experimental and is not recommended for production use.
developer_understanding_on_working: The 'enable_transient_replication' configuration option is checked in the code to determine if transient replication is enabled or not. If transient replication is enabled, certain actions are taken based on this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The triggering frequency of the 'enable_transient_replication' configuration is dependent on the specific actions that require checking if transient replication is enabled. This could vary based on the operations being performed in the system.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the 'enable_transient_replication' configuration option is significant as it determines whether transient replication is allowed on the node. Enabling transient replication can have implications on data replication strategies and performance in the system.
